data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ballia, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 35,638 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Ballia.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 3,164,853 who are far from you in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, help 647 new simple churches start among the 3,239,800 people in the county of Ballia, Uttar Pradesh, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bind people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 35,638 believers in Ballia to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,204,162 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Ballia to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ballia, Uttar Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

location.name: Ballia
location.people_groups_list: Daryadasi, Kumhar Kanaujia, Tawaif (Hindu traditions), Mallah Chain (Hindu traditions), Sonar Bawaria
